name: WestonExpressions Inc.
description: Developer of a digital signage analytics platform designed to offer live audience data for digital out-of-home advertising. The company's platform provides real-time, actionable insights by generating a series of performance reports for website impressions and dwell times as well as offers engagement and conversion metrics, enabling enterprises to increase their advertisement revenues as well as access real-time campaign analytics to measure and improve performance.
one_liner: Developer of a digital signage analytics platform designed to offer live audience data for digital out-of-home advertising. The company's platform provides real-time, actionable insights by generating a series of performance reports for website impressions and dwell times as well as offers engagement and conversion metrics, enabling enterprises to increase their advertisement revenues as well as access real-time campaign analytics to measure and improve performance.
